definition: cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Offer Tianjin Port international ocean shipping service, with best price, guarantee of shipping space.
sentences.chinese: 天津港起运国际海运最优价格，舱位保证。

sentences.english: We can book the shipping space on the direct steamer to your port.
sentences.chinese: 我们能在去您港口的直运轮船上定到舱位。

sentences.english: Please arrange for shipment by nest available steamer.
sentences.chinese: 请安排队下一班可订到舱位的轮船装运。

sentences.english: There are still some second-class cabins.
Cabin seats and ticket numbers have also been included.
sentences.chinese: 舱位和座位号也标记在上面。

sentences.english: You' ll find your cabin amidships.
The airline will shrink economy class to make roomfor the new cabin.
sentences.chinese: 为增加新类型的舱位，该公司将缩减经济舱空间。

sentences.english: Please ship the goods by the first available steamer (by the first steamer available).
sentences.chinese: 请用第一艘可订到舱位的船只装运该货。

sentences.english: The girl had left most of her meals untouched outside her cabin door.
sentences.chinese: 女孩最近对留在她舱位门外的餐饭纹丝未动。

sentences.english: For student (NSD), labour (NLA) and Seaman (NSC) fares, there is no child discount.
sentences.chinese: 对学生，劳务和海员舱位不提供儿童折扣。
我们的舱位在船的中腰。

sentences.english: Please ship the goods by the first available steamer early next month.
sentences.chinese: 请在下个月初将货物装上第一艘可订到舱位的货船。

sentences.english: As soon as shipping space is booked, we shall advise you of the name.
sentences.chinese: 一等我放顶到舱位便会通知你方船名。

sentences.english: Mileage redemption of the class can be full.
sentences.chinese: 可以用里程换购的舱位已满。

sentences.english: I'll need two coach seats open return date.
sentences.chinese: 我需要两个经济舱位返回日期不限。

definition: airline (abbr. for 航空公司[hang2 kong1 gong1 si1])
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
Air China (abbr. for 中國國際航空公司|中国国际航空公司[Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1])
leg of air or sea voyage
regular passenger or cargo ship/regular steamship service
